item.title: By: propane
item.dc:creator: propane
item.description: There are a lot of options, the only real issue is paying freight which can be expensive for these models. I run http://www.gasfridgedepot.com/ and freight is what we work hardest at to keep costs low so the energy savings can be achieved without paying too much upfront.
item.content:encoded: There are a lot of options, the only real issue is paying freight which can be expensive for these models. I run http://www.gasfridgedepot.com/ and freight is what we work hardest at to keep costs low so the energy savings can be achieved without paying too much upfront.

item.title: By: BensDiscountSupply.com
item.dc:creator: BensDiscountSupply.com
item.description: There are a lot of options available in the propane refrigerator market these days. Crystal Cold has just released a 21 cubic foot propane gas refrigerator freezer which is now the largest gas refrigerator freezer on the market. Blizzard now makes a 22 cubic foot propane freezer. We have come a long way from the old Servel models your grandpa used to have, and now have a large selection of state of the art modern models including stainless steel, glass shelves, clear crispers and more. Visit www.BensDiscountSupply.com to see every Propane Refrigerator on the market! You can also see videos of many of these on my YouTube Channel http://www.youtube.com/user/BensDiscountSupply
item.content:encoded:
There are a lot of options available in the propane refrigerator market these days. Crystal Cold has just released a 21 cubic foot propane gas refrigerator freezer which is now the largest gas refrigerator freezer on the market. Blizzard now makes a 22 cubic foot propane freezer. We have come a long way from the old Servel models your grandpa used to have, and now have a large selection of state of the art modern models including stainless steel, glass shelves, clear crispers and more.
Visit http://www.BensDiscountSupply.com/ to see every Propane Refrigerator on the market!
You can also see videos of many of these on my YouTube Channel
http://www.youtube.com/user/BensDiscountSupply
